Introduction
This topic contains information about requests for reconsideration, review, and correction of proposed rating decisions, including
requests for reconsideration of a proposed rating decision
system updates
upon receipt of a request for reconsideration
, and
after processing a request for reconsideration
identification of errors in a proposed rating decision
PEB-directed rating returns (PDRRs)
, and
handling PDRRs: DRAS responsibilities
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 6, Section H - Integrated Disability Evaluation System (IDES) Proposed Ratings
citation: Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 6, Section H
